quote: She brushed the tears from their faces and sang them a melancholy lullaby. Her obvious devotion to her daughters pulled at my heart strings, making my chest ache with longing for my own mother.
quote_letters: SHE BRUSHED THE TEARS FROM THEIR FACES AND SANG THEM A MELANCHOLY LULLABY HER OBVIOUS DEVOTION TO HER DAUGHTERS PULLED AT MY HEART STRINGS MAKING MY CHEST ACHE WITH LONGING FOR MY OWN MOTHER
